alert.note: Alert for Oklahoma (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued July 11 at 6:48AM CDT until July 12 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 1245 PM CDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by heavy rain. * WHERE...A portion of central Oklahoma, including the following counties, Logan and Oklahoma. * WHEN...Until 1245 PM CDT. * IMPACTS...Streams continue to rise due to excess runoff from earlier rainfall. Low-water crossings are inundated with water and may not be passable. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 647 AM CDT, Residual flooding of low lying and poorly drained areas. Flooding is already occurring in the warned area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Oklahoma City, Edmond, Midwest City, Del City, Guthrie, Bethany, Choctaw, Warr Acres, The Village, Harrah, Spencer, Nichols Hills, Jones, Nicoma Park, Luther, Cashion, Valley Brook, Arcadia, Tinker Air Force Base and Newalla. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Keep children away from storm drains, culverts, creeks and streams. Water levels can rise rapidly and sweep children away.
